${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
${modID}:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:Bakaham.NAME: Bakaham
${modID}:Bakaham.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy does not intend to Attack, draw a card.

${modID}:EmergencyRedBull.NAME: Emergency Red Bull
${modID}:EmergencyRedBull.DESCRIPTION: Lose 3 HP. NL Gain [E] [E]. NL Shuffle a *Jager *Bomb into your draw pile.
${modID}:EmergencyRedBull.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Lose 3 HP. NL Gain [E] [E]. NL Shuffle a *Jager *Bomb+ into your draw pile.

${modID}:JagerBomb.NAME: Jager Bomb
${modID}:JagerBomb.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:SourdoughBread.NAME: Sourdough Bread
${modID}:SourdoughBread.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add !M! *Bread into your hand. NL Gain 1 *Satiety.

${modID}:Bread.NAME: Bread
${modID}:Bread.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain 1 *Satiety. NL Apply !M! *Fatigue. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Gluttony.NAME: Gluttony
${modID}:Gluttony.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 *Satiety. NL Deal !D! damage. NL If Fatal, raise your Max Satiety by !M!. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:AgedProsciutto.NAME: Aged Prosciutto
${modID}:AgedProsciutto.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 *Satiety. NL Deal !D! damage to a random enemy. NL Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies.

${modID}:HokkaidoUniBuffet.NAME: Hokkaido Uni Buffet
${modID}:HokkaidoUniBuffet.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL This turn, *Satiety will not trigger and you cannot draw additional cards.

${modID}:SleepDebt.NAME: Sleep Debt
${modID}:SleepDebt.DESCRIPTION: Enemies take damage equal to their *Fatigue at the end of your turn.
${modID}:SleepDebt.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Enemies take damage equal to their *Fatigue at the end of your turn.

${modID}:GroupProject.NAME: "Group" Project
${modID}:GroupProject.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if an enemy is asleep. NL Deal !D! damage to all enemies.

${modID}:Baguette.NAME: Baguette
${modID}:Baguette.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add a *Bread to your hand.
${modID}:Baguette.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add 2 *Bread to your hand.

${modID}:ExquisitelyStuffed.NAME: Exquisitely Stuffed
${modID}:ExquisitelyStuffed.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each *Satiety you have.

${modID}:ShrimpChips.NAME: Shrimp Chips
${modID}:ShrimpChips.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! card. NL Gain 1 *Satiety.
${modID}:ShrimpChips.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Gain 1 *Satiety.

${modID}:CodeReview.NAME: Code Review
${modID}:CodeReview.DESCRIPTION: Place a card from your hand on top of your draw pile. NL Apply !M! *Fatigue.
${modID}:CodeReview.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Place a card from your hand on top of your draw pile and upgrade it. NL Apply !M! *Fatigue.

${modID}:Leftovers.NAME: Leftovers
${modID}:Leftovers.DESCRIPTION: Discard all *Food cards in your hand. NL Draw !M! cards for each card discarded.

${modID}:SubwayNap.NAME: Subway Nap
${modID}:SubwayNap.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! *Fatigue. NL Draw 1 more card next turn.

${modID}:UtilityScience.NAME: Utility Science
${modID}:UtilityScience.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you create a card, gain !M! *Wrinkler.
${modID}:UtilityScience.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you create a card, gain !M! *Wrinkler. NL *Innate.

${modID}:Croissant.NAME: L'Appartement 4F
${modID}:Croissant.DESCRIPTION: Add a *Bread into your hand. NL Whenever you play a *Bread this turn, draw !M! cards.

${modID}:ThinkingWithPortals.NAME: Thinking With Portals
${modID}:ThinkingWithPortals.DESCRIPTION: Discard 2 cards. NL Return !M! cards from your discard pile to your hand. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:ThinkingWithPortals.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard 2 cards. NL Return !M! cards from your discard pile to your hand.

${modID}:Understand.NAME: Understand.
${modID}:Understand.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever you play a 0-cost card, this enemy loses !M! strength that turn. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Leipaa.NAME: Leipää
${modID}:Leipaa.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to !M! times the number of *Bread played this combat.

${modID}:SpiritIsland.NAME: Spirit Island
${modID}:SpiritIsland.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you've played a *Skill and *Power this turn, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

${modID}:SuppressiveFire.NAME: Suppressive Fire
${modID}:SuppressiveFire.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL End your turn. NL *Ethereal.
${modID}:SuppressiveFire.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL End your turn.

${modID}:AutomationScience.NAME: Automation Science
${modID}:AutomationScience.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you deal 20 or more damage in a single hit, gain !M! *Punctual.

${modID}:Connoisseur.NAME: Connoisseur
${modID}:Connoisseur.DESCRIPTION: Gain 3 Strength. NL Gain 3 Dexterity. NL Lose !M! max *Satiety.

${modID}:ThreeChairMethod.NAME: X-Chair Method
${modID}:ThreeChairMethod.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! *Fatigue to all enemies X times.
${modID}:ThreeChairMethod.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! *Fatigue to all enemies X+1 times.

${modID}:Inception.NAME: Inception
${modID}:Inception.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy is asleep, apply !M! Vulnerable and !M! Weak.

${modID}:FoodComa.NAME: Food Coma
${modID}:FoodComa.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! *Fatigue. NL If you have *Satiety, gain [E] and draw a card.

${modID}:Cheesecake.NAME: Cheesecake
${modID}:Cheesecake.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 *Satiety. NL If this ends your turn, gain !M! Strength.

${modID}:SweetDreams.NAME: Sweet Dreams
${modID}:SweetDreams.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an enemy falls asleep, draw !M! cards.

${modID}:SnoozeAlarm.NAME: Snooze Alarm
${modID}:SnoozeAlarm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Excess *Fatigue is not consumed. NL Whenever an enemy falls asleep, apply !M! *Drowsy.

${modID}:HyperEntropy.NAME: HyperEntropy
${modID}:HyperEntropy.DESCRIPTION: Open a *Hyperfloor after this combat. NL *Exhaust.

${modID}:Karaoke.NAME: Karaoke
${modID}:Karaoke.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL *Schedule !M!: *Amp.
${modID}:Karaoke.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL *Schedule !M!: *Amp+.

${modID}:Amp.NAME: Amp
${modID}:Amp.DESCRIPTION: If triggered by an attack, it deals !M! additional damage.

${modID}:DailyReminders.NAME: Daily Reminders
${modID}:DailyReminders.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this card triggers an event, NL *Schedule 7 a copy of it.

${modID}:HappyBirthday.NAME: Happy Birthday
${modID}:HappyBirthday.DESCRIPTION: *Schedule !M!: *Birthday *Song. NL Add a *Birthday *Song to your discard pile.
${modID}:HappyBirthday.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: *Schedule !M!: *Birthday *Song+. NL Add a *Birthday *Song+ to your discard pile.

${modID}:BirthdaySong.NAME: Birthday Song
${modID}:BirthdaySong.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Increase the damage of ALL *Birthday *Song events by !M! this combat.

${modID}:Draft.NAME: Draft
${modID}:Draft.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 random cards to add to your hand.
${modID}:Draft.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 random cards to add to your hand. NL Scry !M!.

${modID}:ChefsTable.NAME: Chef's Table
${modID}:ChefsTable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL *Schedule 6: *Tasting *Menu. NL Lose !M! Gold. NL Gain 2 Satiety.
${modID}:ChefsTable.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL *Schedule 6: *Tasting *Menu+. NL Lose !M! Gold. NL Gain 2 Satiety.

${modID}:TastingMenu.NAME: Tasting Menu
${modID}:TastingMenu.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy for each *Satiety gained this combat.

${modID}:Drunkus.NAME: Drunkus
${modID}:Drunkus.DESCRIPTION: If triggered by an attack, convert its damage to *Fatigue.
${modID}:Drunkus.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: If triggered by an attack, convert its damage to *Fatigue and increase it by !M!.

${modID}:DreadfulStrikes.NAME: Dreadful Strikes
${modID}:DreadfulStrikes.DESCRIPTION: If triggered by an attack, NL it deals !M! additional damage and NL this bonus increases by 2 for ALL *Dreadful *Strikes.

${modID}:Lunch.NAME: Lunch
${modID}:Lunch.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! *Drowsy. NL Gain 1 *Satiety.

${modID}:FortyEightHourDay.NAME: 48 Hour Day
${modID}:FortyEightHourDay.DESCRIPTION: Double events triggered this turn. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:DateForm.NAME: Date Form
${modID}:DateForm.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain !M! *Punctual for each Event in *Schedule. NL *Ethereal.
${modID}:DateForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain !M! *Punctual for each Event in *Schedule.

${modID}:OneMoreRun.NAME: One More Run
${modID}:OneMoreRun.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! *Fatigue for each Event triggered this turn.

${modID}:Arcade.NAME: Arcade
${modID}:Arcade.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! *Dexterity for each *Satiety. At the end of this turn, lose that much *Dexterity.

${modID}:Gym.NAME: Gym
${modID}:Gym.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! *Strength for each *Satiety. At the end of this turn, lose that much *Strength.

${modID}:QualityTime.NAME: Quality Time
${modID}:QualityTime.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Upgrade all Events in *Schedule.

${modID}:Confession.NAME: Confession
${modID}:Confession.DESCRIPTION: The triggering card is played twice.
${modID}:Confession.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The triggering card is played three times.

${modID}:Cleaning.NAME: Cleaning
${modID}:Cleaning.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! *Fatigue to all enemies for each Event *Exhausted.

${modID}:Drink.NAME: Drink!
${modID}:Drink.DESCRIPTION: If triggered by an attack, it deals !M! additional damage.

${modID}:StackCup.NAME: Stack Cup
${modID}:StackCup.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If no damage is taken before your next turn, *Schedule 1: Drink!.
${modID}:StackCup.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! *Weak. NL If no damage is taken before your next turn, *Schedule 1: Drink!.

${modID}:MFUltimate.NAME: MF Ultimate
${modID}:MFUltimate.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies !M! times. NL If you take damage, *Exhaust this from the *Schedule.

${modID}:Jersey.NAME: Jersey
${modID}:Jersey.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card this turn, apply !M! *Fatigue to ALL enemies.

${modID}:CalendarTetris.NAME: Calendar Tetris
${modID}:CalendarTetris.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you *Schedule an Event, draw a card.
${modID}:CalendarTetris.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you *Schedule an Event, draw a card. NL *Innate.

${modID}:DeepSleep.NAME: Deep Sleep
${modID}:DeepSleep.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an effect ends your turn, gain !M! *Wrinkler.

${modID}:LogisticScience.NAME: Logistic Science
${modID}:LogisticScience.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain *Punctual, gain !M! *Strength, *Dexterity, and max *Satiety this turn.

${modID}:RocketFactory.NAME: Rocket Factory
${modID}:RocketFactory.DESCRIPTION: After every !M! debuffs prevented by *Wrinkler, NL *Schedule 1: *Launch.
${modID}:RocketFactory.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: After every !M! debuffs prevented by *Wrinkler, NL *Schedule 1: *Launch. NL *Innate.

${modID}:Launch.NAME: Launch
${modID}:Launch.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Shuffle 1 *Burn into your draw pile.
